article.title: Government Secure Solutions to Support Intelligence in Afghanistan
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Government Secure Solutions CGI Inc., Manassas, Va., was awarded a $27,019,494 cost-plus-fixed-fee, non-option eligible, non-multi-year contract for services support of technology enhancements that are integrated into the intelligence enterprise for use in Afghanistan and world-wide. The U.S. Army Intelligence and Security Command â€“ Fort Belvoir, Va. is the contracting activity (W911W4-13-C-0009).
